product_name: Acorn Leeda Mule Slippers - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Great for cozy fireside evenings, the Acorn Leeda Mule women's slippers keep your feet warm with soft Italian wool. Add a blanket and a good book and you've got the makings of a great night in. Textured Italian wool uppers with fleece linings provide soft, breathable insulation. EVA insoles and polyurethane midsoles with memory foam provide all-day support and cushioning. Non-slip weatherproof thermoplastic rubber outsoles are great for indoor and outdoor use. Closeout.
short_description: Great for cozy fireside evenings, the Acorn Leeda Mule women's slippers keep your feet warm with soft Italian wool. Add a blanket and a good book and you've got the makings of a great night in.
